sentences.sContent: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.sCn: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.sContent: He was beginning to get angry .
His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.sCn: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.sContent: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.sCn: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.sContent: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.sCn: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

exam.question: Yao Ming is one of the best players in NBA, We are all ______ him.

answer.explain: 译文： 姚明是NBA最佳球员之一。我们都以他为荣。 本题考查短语的含义。be angry with意为“生…的气”； be strict with意为“对…严格”； be worried about意为“担心…”； be proud of意为“以…为荣”， 因此选D。

synos.tran: 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的

trans.tranCn: 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的
trans.tranOther: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc
